00012 void dissectCodeArguments(MavenCompiler* c, string& rawargs, string& blocktype) {
00013         if(rawargs != "") {
00014                 // we split the arguments and dissect them indervidualy
00015                 StringList arg = splitCommas(rawargs);
00016                 string signature = "";
00017                 rawargs = "";
00018                 for(int a = 0; a < arg.length(); ++a) {
00019                         if(signature != "") {
00020                                 signature += ",";
00021                                 rawargs += ",";
00022                         }
00023                         StringList argtype;
00024                         MavenMutability m;
00025                         rawargs += dissectCode(c, arg[a], argtype, m);
00026                         signature += argtype.join(",");
00027                 }
00028                 blocktype = signature;
00029         }
00030 }
